= Introduction =
This !WikiPage is DataBase Design Doc, described the details about the DataBase used in this project. 

= DataBase Description =

Database name:  flood

|| *Table Name* || *Description* || *Prime Index* ||
|| User || Infomations about users || user_id ||
|| Admin || Informations about admins and super access users || NULL ||
|| !Login_Log || Login Log about users || user_id ||
|| Mail || Informations about mail between users || mail_id ||
|| Message || Informations about message in discuss board || message_id ||
|| !Source_Code || Informations about submitted source code || submit_id ||
|| Submit || Informations about submits || submit_id ||
|| Problem || Informations about problems || problem_id ||
|| Contest || Informations about contests || contest_id ||
|| !Contest_Problem || Connection informations about contest and problems, to show which problems hold by a contest || contest_id ||
|| !Contest_User || Connection informations about contest and users if there is a private contest, to show which users can join a contest || contest_id ||


= Table Details =

== User ==
|| *Field* || *Type* || *Null* || *Key* || *Default* || *Extra* || *_Note_* ||
|| user_id || varchar(16) || NO || PRI || || || user's id ||
|| password || text || NO || || || || user's password, encryption by MD5 ||
|| email || varchar(64) || YES || || || || user's email address ||
|| school || varchar(64) || YES || || || || user's school info ||
|| nickname || varchar(64) || NO || || || || user's nickname ||
|| reg_time || datatime || NO || || || || register time of this user ||
|| available || bool || NO || || true || || is this user_id available ||
|| default_language || tinyint unsigned || NO || || 1 || || the default programming language of this user ||
|| last_volume || tinyint unsigned || NO || || 1 || || the last problem volume this user stayed ||
|| submit || int unsigned || NO || || 0 || || submit times ||
|| passed || int unsigned || NO || || 0 || || submits passed times ||
|| solved || int unsigned || NO || || 0 || || solved problems count ||
